data.title: what the Privacy Policy incorporates?
data.description: We acknowledge the significance of privacy for our users and we respect your choices and matters of privacy. This privacy policy outlines what information we collect from you, how we use, share, store, and secure your collected information. If you disagree with this policy, don't access or utilize our Services or impart with any of the aspects of our business.

data.title: Information collected automatically while using the Services
points: Device and Connection Information; We gather information about your computer, phone, tablet, or different gadgets along with your IP address to get to the Services.

data.title: How the collected information is used ?
data.description: Following are the purposes for which the information collected about you is used:
points: To provide the Services and personalize your experience: The collected information is used to enhance your experience by providing customer support, effective collaboration with others, relevant search results, pertinent notifications and feeds

For research and development: We are continuously in search of approaches to make our services quicker, secure, coordinated, and helpful and the information provided by you helps to achieve such qualities.

To communicate with you about the Services: The collected data is used to send correspondences through email, including confirmation of purchases, sending you specialized notifications, reminders, security questions, and so on.

To market, promote and drive engagement with the Services: Promotional communications according to your specific interest are sent using your collected information aiming at driving the engagement, maximizing the benefits out of services for you, providing information about new features, surveys, newsletters which may be of your interest.
Customer support: We utilize your Data to address your request for assistance to respond to the issues you may be facing and aim at fixing such issues by improving the services.
For safety and security: The collected information is used to verify the account and activities to prevent the behavior of vindictive, deceitful, criminal, and infringement of service arrangements.

To protect our legitimate business interests and legal rights: Wherever necessary to ensure lawful rights and interests, your data is used in connection with legal claims, regulatory, and audit functions.
With your consent: We use the information about you where there is your consent to do so for a particular reason not recorded previously.

data.title: How the information we collect is stored and secured ?
points: How long we keep information: After a certain period, we will either erase or block your information. If that is not possible then we will safely confine your data securely.

Marketing information: If you have chosen to get advertising emails from us, we utilize your data to promote for a sensible timeframe from the date when you last communicated your interest in our services.
